titleStmt.title: The tragedie of Cleopatra Queen of Ægypt. By T.M. Acted 1626
titleStmt.author: May, Thomas, 1595-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper for Thomas Walkly, and are to be sold at his shop at the flying Horse neer York House,

notesStmt.note: Intended to be issued with his: The tragedy of Julia Agrippina Empresse of Rome.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the flying Horse neer York House
